item.title: Basic Programming Principles
item.description: Table of contents Principle of the Least Privilege DRY: Don’t Repeat Yourself Composition over Inheritance Single Responsibility / Separation of concerns You aren’t going to need it ðŸš€ Principle of the Least Privilege ðŸ“– Wiki page In computer science, every module must be able to access only the information and resources that are necessary for its legitimate purpose.
